high_descs: Go straight, turn left and make a right towards the bed
Pick up remote control from the bed
Turn right and make a left and go straight towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a remote control by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: Go straight and turn right, head straight and hang right to the bed
pick up a remote control from bed
Turn right and head straight, turn right and go straight to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a remote control by the light of a floor lamp.

high_descs: Head through the door in the bedroom and move to the bed
pick the remote control from the bed
turn around and move to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp to check the remote control
